lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Dome spokesman David Annesley said in New York that TransCanada's announcement could be seen as an attempt to fix the bidding price for Dome and an effort to preclude other possible buyers from making an offer.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Dome does not consider TransCanada's proposal a formal offer because the pipeline utility's announcement breached a confidential agreement between the two companies, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Dome announced its plan to 56 major creditors as well as public noteholders in March after several months of delicate negotiations.
